Section.Catchline: Prohibition against requiring the purchase of health insurance; exceptions.

Subsection.Text: A person may not be compelled to purchase health insurance, except as a condition of:

Paragraph.Text: Voluntary participation in a state or local benefit;
Undertaking an occupation having a risk of occupational injury or illness;
An order of child support; or

Subsection.Text: This section does not prohibit the collection of debts lawfully incurred for health insurance.
